name: General facts and current situation
description: Questions about routines, habits, opinions, likes, dislikes, or general truths.

name: Personal experiences and past events
description: Questions about things you have done, experienced, or practiced.

name: Future plans and intentions
description: Questions about what someone intends, expects, or plans to do.

name: Hypothetical situations and conditions
description: Questions about “what if” scenarios, conditional situations, or imaginary events.

name: Opinions and preferences
description: Questions asking for personal likes, dislikes, or subjective viewpoints.

name: Social and cultural knowledge
description: Questions about social media, famous people, public figures, or societal trends.

name: Work and professional life
description: Questions about jobs, careers, projects, responsibilities, or workplace experiences.

name: Education and learning
description: Questions about studies, courses, learning new skills, or educational experiences.

name: Health, lifestyle, and personal habits
description: Questions about exercise, diet, sports, daily routines, or wellbeing.

name: Travel and leisure
description: Questions about trips, vacations, hobbies, or leisure activities.

name: Admiration, inspiration, and role models
description: Questions about famous people, inspiring figures, or personal heroes.

name: Problem-solving or decision-making
description: Questions about choices, changes, or what someone would do in a situation.

name: Past habits or continuous past actions
description: Questions about actions that happened repeatedly or continuously in the past.

name: Planning and goal achievement
description: Questions about projects, long-term goals, or expected outcomes.
